N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 8.13 - Advance for travel expenses

State Regulations

Generally, agencies are expected to provide each agency
traveler with a credit care enabling the traveler to charge traveling expenses
directly to the State and to avoid the need for the agency to make an advance
payment to a traveler for traveling expenses. However, an agency may advance
funds to a traveler for traveling expenses when it is in the best interests of
the State to do so, and a traveler shall account for such a payment upon
completion of the travel for which the payment was advanced. Notes
